Article.ArticleTitle: Ischemic stroke penumbra and extracorporeal ozone treatment.

AbstractText: The course of events in ischemic strokes is normally seen from a point in which the penumbra is already in place. Since there is no known treatment for edema reduction, mainstream medicine focuses on re-opening the occluded vessel. Here we show that reducing the penumbra saves neuronal units from undergoing apoptosis.
